content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and facilities. I'm sure we can find a price that suits both of us. Let's start with 1200 euros. Remember, I'm always open to higher offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a pretty high price for an unfurnished apartment. Considering that the apartment is unfurnished and the furniture will cost me additional money, the price should be lower. I'm a student, so I'm on a tight budget. How about 800 euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but 800 euros is far below my expectations. I understand you're a student, but I'm sure you understand that this is a prime location and the facilities around this area are top-notch. I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm looking for a price that justifies the value of this apartment. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1000 euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. But 1000 euros is still quite a lot for me. I have to consider the costs of furniture, study materials, and other living expenses. How about 850 euros? I think this is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo, but 850 euros is still too low for this apartment. I'm willing to be reasonable, but I cannot go that low. This apartment is a great opportunity, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its value once you move in. How about 950 euros? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my situation. I understand that the apartment is in high demand and has great facilities. But as a student, I have to consider all my expenses. 950 euros is still a bit high for me. How about 900 euros? This is my final offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding of my position, Yi-Nuo. However, I cannot accept 900 euros. This apartment is a great opportunity, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its value once you move in. 950 euros is my final offer. If you agree to this price, I'll be more than happy to rent out the apartment to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 950 euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [950] Euro! Congratulations, Yi-Nuo! The apartment is now yours for 950 euros. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay here. If there's anything else I can help you with, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your understanding and cooperation throughout this negotiation. I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'm sure you'll love the apartment and the neighborhood. If you have any questions or need any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. Have a great day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I have no further questions or concerns. Let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
